checkAvailability retrieves the opening and closing hours of the branch and assign it to the variables, openTiming and closeTiming LocalTime currentTiming calls for the current time by LocalTime function If statement is used checking for whether the branch is open or closed based on current timing If the branch is closed, it will display a message to come again tomorrow If the branch is open then it will tell the user that the branch is currently open

F

ForeignCurrencies() - Method in class account.ForeignX
ForeignCurrencies() reads the data from FX csv to retrieve the latest currency rates
foreignX - Variable in class account.Account
 
ForeignX - Class in account
ForeignX class is used for storing information of the user's foreign currency balance of different currencies It also stores the currency rates of the different countries This class is connected to the Account class as it borrows the same account ID to perform the foreign exchanging transactions
ForeignX(int) - Constructor for class account.ForeignX
Special class constructor for ForeignX class with a unique identifier accountID, to extract specific data tagged to the ID and use for currency exchanges

Loan - Class in account

V

validateOTP(int, String) - Method in class bank.Security
Checks if the input argument matches the one found in OTP hashmap, otpMap Method has 3 conditions: Valid User ID, Non-expired OTP and Correct One-time password value If any of the three conditions fail, return a False value.
validatePassword(int, String) - Method in class bank.Security
Checks if input password matches password stored in password Hashmap, userPwdMap.
viewAllBranches() - Method in class bank.Branch
Function to view the list of branches by looping through the array that has been instantised It will display every branch detail according to the branch code
viewBranchDetails() - Method in class bank.Branch
Method viewBranchDetails is used to print the specific set of information: branch code, branch name, branch reserve and their opening/closing Hours
viewCurrencyBalances() - Method in class account.ForeignX
viewCurrencyBalances() prints the details of the specific account and its balances
viewCurrencyRates() - Method in class account.ForeignX
viewCurrencyRates() is for the purpose of printing the latest currency rates for user to keep up to date
